column5: Well, so much for pike fishing, turns out that I have to retrain my daughter to fish   Didn't even get my line wet!   Oh well, met a couple of nice guys out there and Thea was catching her sunfish that made her happy! Even the guy fishing beside me had a nice jumbo surprise smallmouth bass, must have been around 6 pounds easy! Thea had a couple of pike and/or muskie follow he sunfish and Perch in to shore. All in all a nice afternoon!! Pictures are coming!  Tinman
Beautiful out of season bass, meet you in the summer buddy!
That is one priceless pic of your daughter Tinman.  I just love that expression ..... worth more than a thousand words.
thats a nice smallie and congrats to ur daughter on teh panfish
Looks like your daughter was having fun, great picture...
Wow!!  She sure knows how to catch some nice sized sunnies!!  Looked like she had a great time too.  I love their smiles when they catch fish...it's priceless!  Thanks for the pic and report!
Its great! Nothing better whne she freaks out when she has a fish on!
Your math is strong jackel! lol Badger figured it out too. Good to see ya!  Tinman

Congrats"   i 'm glad you tried Manotick ... did you fish at the dam or the bridge ? try fishin the bridge on the west side with a big chub on a 2/0 hook suspended under a bobber it worked well when i lived there..   KEEP A WET LINE...  Randy.
Hey Randy! Tried over by the mill, I guess thats the damn, IT was fun, Tried the bridge last year with no luck, but I tried in late summer. Is it good now?  Tinman
